title: Ziggs Bomb Cake Pops and Health and Mana  Pot Drinks!
body:
I will be making this stuff for my boyfriends birthday. We're long distance so I planned on making them when he comes down for Dragon Con... Well now we just happen to cross paths in California on his birthday weekend, so next Saturday we're going to the LCS. I wanted to share my creations and HOPEFULLY he won't see them lol. I also wanted to reach out a bit and see if anyone knew if it was possible for me to bring these things to the actual LCS studio since he's catching a flight right after or if maybe there is anywhere near by that would be cool to have cakes and drinks... I worked really hard, so being able to share this with him, on his birthday at LCS would be so awesome!

[Pics here!](http://imgur.com/a/kseLy)
{{champion:115}} is his favorite Champion, thus the theme!
I'm also thinking of making {{champion:201}}  Mustache candy pops filled with either caramel or peanut butter, but  already have the mold so we'll see...

replies.body: I don't see a problem with bringing edible {{champion:115}} bombs to the studio or any other outside food for that matter. Besides..these look so yummy; how can we say no?

Ah! Thank you so much! And not to toot my own horn but they are pretty yummy! Made with chocolate cake! :3
I'll make much more than this for Saturday so there should be some to share. 

Is there by any chance a place I can put my goodies so I'm not sitting with them in my lap while watching?
OMG this is awesome. Well done :)
Thank you so much!! And you can certainly have some Saturday at LCS!
Additionally, I'd like to post this on reddit to get more input but I don't use it much and don't know the appropriate subreddit. D:

You look like Jinx but with purple hair instead of blue.

Oh, and that poro is an amazing prop for a delicious looking set of snack.

My hair was blue before it was purple, but now it's cut like Vi's but thank you I think? Jinx is one of my favorite champs!

And I got the inflatable poro from the riot after party at Pax East, well, a friend got it for me. :<
